segments.original_transcript: Good evening. Thank you for calling ITC. My name is Tamir. How can I help you? Hello. Good evening, sir. Can you speak in Bengali? Huh? Bengali, Hindi, which language are you comfortable? Bengali, Bengali. Tell me, sir, how can I help you? Speak in Bengali. Can you speak in Bengali? Yes, I can. Yes, tell me, sir, how can I help you? I saw your IPC company's Facebook ad for a franchisee. I spoke to them and they told me a few things. I was not satisfied with that. So I thought of contacting you. Do you want a franchisee? Of course. I will register your details for a franchisee. Okay? Yes. I will transfer your details to your team manager. My team will check it. If there is a vacancy in your area, you will be able to get a franchisee. Otherwise, you will have to wait. Do you want me to register? Yes, of course. Okay. Your name is Shami Maktar Mosham. Yes, I am Maktar Mosham. Mosham, Mosham. Okay. Thank you. Please confirm your contact number. Yes, it is 8161-756-261. Okay. This is the number I spoke to you about, right? Yes, this is the number I spoke to you about. Okay, okay. Thank you. Okay. What is the location you want to register? Murshidabad, Bengal. Murshidabad. It is close to your house, right? Actually, it is close to my house. I don't understand. Dom call. Dom call. Dom call. Location is 742,303. 742,303. Yes. 742,303. Yes, I understand. Thank you. Do you have any alternate number? Alternate number? Yes. If you have one, please give it to me. Otherwise, no problem. I will give it to you. Note it down. Okay. 792,34. Okay. 832,92,92. This is my brother's number. His name is Rasul Rana. 92,92, right? Yes. 792,34. 832,92,92. Okay. Thank you. 9734,38. 5293, right? Yes. Okay. Thank you. This is my brother's number. His name is Rasul Rana. Okay. Which products do you want to check? ITC all products, FMTG products? Or one or two in particular? No, no, no. I want to store it. I want to take the distributorship and sell it at the price of Rs. 10,000. So, food products and everything? Yes, yes. Yes, yes. Food, groceries, etc. I am going to store it. This is your food department. So, I can only register for food from here. Do you want to take any other product? Or is it just for food? It's not just for food. So, I have it, I have it for food, I have cigarettes, it's different. Food, cigarettes. Yes, you have different products. Okay? So, do you want to register just for food or do you want to take cigarettes too? If you want to take cigarettes, then I can give you the number of the cigarette department. Yes, I am going for cigarettes. I am going for food. And you have ITC products, right? I am going to do all kinds of business. There is flour, bingo, chips, chocolate. Yes, I have books. Now, you stay on the scene and on the line. I will have to register the different tickets. Now, you will need some time, sir. You will see, I will call you. Please remember once again. I will register. If there is a vacancy there, then you will not get a call. If you are already here in Domkola. Domkola is my search. There is no one in the Domkola dealership. So, you... Keep it in your system. Keep it in your system. If there is a vacancy in your database, then you will definitely get it. Then you will have to wait. Now, can I keep your call for 2 minutes to register? Yes, you can. Keep it. I want to ask you something. If you go to take a vacancy with a scientist, what are the conditions? If you get a call, our executive will explain it to you. Okay? Okay. Now, can I hold your call? Yes, you can. Keep it on the line. Thank you. Thank you. Good work. summary: Shami Maktar Mosham calls ITC and wants to register for a franchise in Murshidabad, Bengal. Tamir takes all of his details and contacts and forwards them to his team, mentioning that if there is a vacancy in Mosham's area, he will get a franchise, otherwise, he will have to wait. They also discuss the products Mosham wants to include in the franchise, such as food, cigarettes, flour, bingo, chips, chocolate, soap, and more. Tamir offers to transfer him to the tobacco secret department, and she provides him with several phone numbers of different departments and a mail ID, in case he has any further questions.
cohere_points:
- User is enquiring about becoming a franchisee of ITC and registering for distributorship of their products
- Agent asks for the user's name, contact information, and location and notes it down
- Agent informs that they will have to wait if there is no vacancy or if they wish to take a different product. 
- The agent gives the user other numbers to call for the tobacco department and other products. 
- The call ends with the agent giving the user numbers to call for other products and the mail id: CONSUMER.Consumer.care.report@itc.
Topic:
1. Customer Inquiry in Bengali
2. Franchise Opportunity Discussion
3. Registration Details Confirmation
4. Location and Contact Verification
5. Products of Interest
6. Distributorship Requirements
7. Food and Cigarette Business
8. Super Shop Establishment Plan
9. Follow-up and Wait Instructions
10. Secret Department Contact Information
Resolution: The customer's issue has been partially resolved as the assistant has taken down the details and promised to register them for a franchise. Further follow up is required to confirm if a vacancy is available in the desired area.
Did the caller Displayed Empathy: Yes, the caller displayed empathy. The caller showed empathy by actively listening to the caller's concerns and needs, acknowledging their frustration with the previous interaction, and reassuring them that their request would be taken seriously.
